item.title: Monitor Tableau Cloud Deployments of Any Size with the Platform Data API
item.description: ğŸš€ Exciting news for Tableau Cloud users! The new Platform Data API enhances observability for all deployments, large and small. Admins can now access centralized event log data, simplifying monitoring and management across teams. This tool ensures safety, compliance, and efficiency, making it easier to manage user activity and permissions. ğŸ“ŠğŸ” Available for all customers, the API supports real-time insights and extended data retention. #Tableau #DataAPI #Analytics #CloudComputing #DataManagement

item.title: Introducing Tableau Cloud Custom Domains
item.description: ğŸ“Š Exciting news for Tableau Cloud users! Tableau has introduced Custom Domains, allowing site admins to set up a brand-specific subdomain, like analytics.example.com. This feature simplifies access to published content and enhances brand identity. ğŸ”’ Key benefits include improved security and seamless embedding of analytics, even in browsers that block third-party cookies. To get started, admins can configure Custom Domains in site settings at no extra cost. #Tableau #BusinessIntelligence…
